body_html: Hey @techchic, sorry for not getting back to you on this one — I was about to reply with some clarifications on the feature last Friday, but then I saw the PR :) @carpodaster has already reviewed it, so once you make the necessary changes, I can take a look at it as well. Thank you for your interest and for your contribution! 👍
